name: Dodge Spree
description:
Run - Jump - Escape to Salvation 

                       

They are coming! You better get moving before they catch you!
               
                                       
Taking place some time after the events of Shoot & Destroy,
Dodge Spree is 1-bit 2D forced side scrolling platformer (Runner - for short). 
                         
                
Run, jump, duck and slide your way towards salvation.     
NOTE: You can only duck for a limited time, so try it before it's required :).
           

Created by Samuel Sousa

        

Created in 2011 with Game Maker, this port aims to preserve this project in its essence, making it playable for the OUYA Anniversary Jam 2021.  

PS: Downloadble content is still work in progress.
